title: Star Trek Games Compilation
description:
14 Classic Star Trek Windows Games

Most of these games were designed for Windows 95/98. I run all of them on a Windows 2000 Professional computer with no problems.

Some of these games may work fine under newer versions of Windows. I've run Birth of the Federation and SFC2:CE under Windows 7.

Star Trek - A Final Unity (DOS)
Star Trek - Armada
Star Trek - Away Team
Star Trek - Birth of the Federation (Original ISO as well as NO_CD patched installer with 1.0.2 update)
Star Trek - Borg (I'd YouTube this instead of trying to play it)
Star Trek - Bridge Commander
Star Trek - Deep Space Nine The Fallen
Star Trek - Elite Force + Expansion
Star Trek - Elite Force II
Star Trek - Klingon Academy
Star Trek - Legacy
Star Trek - Starfleet Command 1, 2, OP & Community Edition project for SFC2

All games come with NO-CD patches, game patches and serial codes for those that need them. Most games are in .ISO format, but a few game discs were multi-session discs, which are in .CUE/.BIN format.

Also included are some game add-ons for SFC2 Multiplayer:
CO-OP Ace 3.0.1
Sector Assault 0.9
EZ-INI



The serial codes included are real codes I received when I purchased these games.

If you like the game, you should buy it. Most of these games can be found for less than $10
